languages.text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} and +10 damage for 3 rounds. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text: 此生物使系统过载，获得+50{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、+50{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、+10{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，效果持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。在此之后，此生物陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 此生物使系统过载，获得+50{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、+50{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、+10{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，效果持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。在此之后，此生物陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: Существо создает перегрузку, получая +50 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, а также +10 к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. После этого оно получает {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Существо создает перегрузку, получая +50 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, а также +10 к наносимому урону на 3 раунда. После этого оно получает {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 раунд.

Существо создает перегрузку, получая +50 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, а также +10 к наносимому урону на 3 раунда. После этого оно получает {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 раунд.

languages.text: 生き物がシステムをオーバーチェンジしたら、３{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}+50、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+10が増加する。その後1{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}ラウンド{/g}の間生き物は気絶状態になる。
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 生物がシステムをオーバーチャージしたら、3ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル（WS）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル（BS）{/g}+50、ダメージ+10が増加する。その後1ラウンドの間、生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。

languages.text: La criatura sobrecarga sus sistemas, por lo que gana +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y +10 al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Después, la criatura queda {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdida{/g} durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: La criatura sobrecarga sus sistemas, por lo que gana +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} y +10 al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Después, la criatura queda {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdida{/g} durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: Die Kreatur überlädt ihre Systeme, wodurch sie 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} sowie +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erhält. Danach ist die Kreatur 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur überlädt ihre Systeme, wodurch sie 3 Runden lang +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} sowie +10 Schaden erhält. Danach ist die Kreatur 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.

languages.text: La créature surcharge ses systèmes, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} ainsi que de +10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Elle subit ensuite l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: La créature surcharge ses systèmes, ce qui lui permet de bénéficier de +50 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} ainsi que de +10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Elle subit ensuite l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Yaratık, kendi sistemlerini aşırı yükleyerek +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ile +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} kazanır. Etkisi 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Yaratık, bu sürenin ardından 1 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature overcharges their systems, gaining +50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the creature becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
